variables.input:
fetch dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster
| fields entity.name
| sort entity.name

fetch dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster
| filter in(entity.name, $Cluster)
| join [fetch dt.entity.cloud_application_namespace
| fieldsAdd clusterId=clustered_by[dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster]], on:{left[id]==right[clusterId]}, fields:{nsName=entity.name}
| fields nsName
| sort nsName

0.title: Workload Health
0.query:
fetch dt.entity.cloud_application
| filter clustered_by[dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster] in [
  fetch dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster
  | filter in(entity.name, $Cluster)
  | fields id
]
| filter in(namespaceName, $Namespace)
| lookup [
  fetch dt.davis.problems
  | filter event.status=="ACTIVE" and dt.davis.is_duplicate==false
  | expand affected_entity_ids
], sourceField:id, lookupField:affected_entity_ids, fields:{event.status, display_id, event.start, event.id}
| fieldsAdd status=if(event.status=="ACTIVE", "Problem", else: "OK")
| sort event.status asc, entity.name

1.title: Service Health
1.query:
fetch dt.entity.service
| filter belongs_to[dt.entity.cloud_application][0] in [
  fetch dt.entity.cloud_application
  | filter clustered_by[dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster] in [
    fetch dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster
    | filter in(entity.name, $Cluster)
    | fields id
  ]
  | filter in(namespaceName, $Namespace)
  | fields id
]
| lookup [
  fetch dt.davis.problems
  | filter event.status=="ACTIVE" and dt.davis.is_duplicate==false
  | expand affected_entity_ids
], sourceField:id, lookupField:affected_entity_ids, fields:{event.status, display_id, event.start, event.id}
| fieldsAdd status=if(event.status=="ACTIVE", "Problem", else: "OK"), timestamp=$dt_timeframe_to
| sort event.status asc, entity.name

10.title: üö© Failure Rate
10.query:
timeseries {failures=sum(dt.service.request.failure_count, default:0), requests=sum(dt.service.request.count, default:1)}, by: { dt.entity.service }, filter:{
  dt.entity.service in [fetch dt.entity.service 
  |filter belongs_to[dt.entity.cloud_application][0] in [
    fetch dt.entity.cloud_application
    | filter clustered_by[dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster] in [
      fetch dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster
      | filter in(entity.name, $Cluster)
      | fields id
    ]
    | filter in(namespaceName, $Namespace)
    | fields id
] | fields id
]
}
| fieldsAdd dt.entity.service.name = entityName(dt.entity.service),failureRate = failures[]/requests[]*100
| fieldsRemove failures, requests
| sort arrayLast(failureRate) desc
| limit 20

11.title: üìà Throughput
11.query:
timeseries requests=sum(dt.service.request.count), by: { dt.entity.service }, filter:{
  dt.entity.service in [fetch dt.entity.service 
  |filter belongs_to[dt.entity.cloud_application][0] in [
    fetch dt.entity.cloud_application
    | filter clustered_by[dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster] in [
      fetch dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster
      | filter in(entity.name, $Cluster)
      | fields id
    ]
    | filter in(namespaceName, $Namespace)
    | fields id
] | fields id
]
}
| fieldsAdd dt.entity.service.name = entityName(dt.entity.service)
| sort arrayAvg(requests) desc
| limit 20

12.title: ‚è±Ô∏è Response Time
12.query:
timeseries requests=avg(dt.service.request.response_time), by: { dt.entity.service }, filter:{
  dt.entity.service in [fetch dt.entity.service 
  |filter belongs_to[dt.entity.cloud_application][0] in [
    fetch dt.entity.cloud_application
    | filter clustered_by[dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster] in [
      fetch dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster
      | filter in(entity.name, $Cluster)
      | fields id
    ]
    | filter in(namespaceName, $Namespace)
    | fields id
] | fields id
]
}
| fieldsAdd dt.entity.service.name = entityName(dt.entity.service)
| sort arrayAvg(requests) desc
| limit 20

13.title: üìî Log Patterns
13.query:
fetch logs
| filter in(k8s.namespace.name, array($Namespace)) and in(status, $LogStatus) and contains(content, $LogSearch)
| parse content, "DATA* JSON:json"
| fieldsAdd pattern=coalesce(message,msg,json[message],json[msg],json[rest],rest,content)
| fieldsAdd pattern=replacePattern(replacePattern(replacePattern(replacePattern(replacePattern(replacePattern(replacePattern(replacePattern(replacePattern(pattern, "UUIDSTRING", "UUID"), "(ISO8601|HTTPDATE|JSONTIMESTAMP|TIMESTAMP|TIME)", "TIME"),"IPADDR", "IP"), "'-' ALNUM{10} '-' ALNUM{5}", "-PODID"), "XDIGIT{5,}", "*"), "DIGIT", "*"), "' /' NSPACE*", " /URLPATH"), "'://' [^/ ] '/'? NSPACE*", "://URL"), "'[!dt' LD ']'", "")
| maketimeseries {count=count(default:0)}, by: {status,pattern, dt.entity.process_group, dt.entity.cloud_application}
| fieldsAdd severity = if(status=="ERROR", 0, else: if(status=="WARN", 1, else:if(status=="NONE", 2, else: 3))), Overall=arraySum(count)
| sort severity, Overall desc
//| fieldsAdd entityName(dt.entity.process_group)
| fieldsRename Pattern=pattern, Count=count, Status=status

14.title: üñπ Logs
14.query:
fetch logs
| filter in(k8s.namespace.name, array($Namespace)) and in(status,$LogStatus) and contains(content, $LogSearch)
| parse content, "DATA* JSON:json"
| parse content, "DATA* '\"rest\":' DQS:rest"
| fieldsAdd Status=status, Timestamp=timestamp, Message=coalesce(message,msg,json[message],json[msg],json[rest],rest,content)
| sort timestamp desc
| limit 100

15.title: ‚è≥ Slow Traces
15.query:
fetch spans
| filter k8s.cluster.uid in [
  fetch dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster
  | filter in(entity.name, $Cluster)
  | fields kubernetesClusterId
]
and in(k8s.namespace.name, array($Namespace)) and isFalseOrNull(request.is_failed) and request.is_root_span
| fields Timestamp=start_time, Namespace=k8s.namespace.name, Workload=k8s.deployment.name, Service=entityName(dt.entity.service), Endpoint=endpoint.name, Duration=duration, start_time, end_time, trace.id, span.id
| sort Duration desc
| limit 20

17.title: Process Health
17.query:
fetch dt.entity.process_group_instance
| filter belongs_to[dt.entity.container_group_instance] in [
  fetch dt.entity.container_group_instance
  | filter belongs_to[dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster] in [
    fetch dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster
    | filter in(entity.name, $Cluster)
    | fields id
  ]
  | filter in(namespaceName, $Namespace)
  | fields id
]
| lookup [
  fetch dt.davis.problems
  | filter event.status=="ACTIVE" and dt.davis.is_duplicate==false
  | expand affected_entity_ids
], sourceField:id, lookupField:affected_entity_ids, fields:{event.status, display_id, event.start, event.id}
| fieldsAdd status=if(event.status=="ACTIVE", "Problem", else: "OK")
| sort event.status asc, entity.name

22.query:
fetch dt.davis.problems
| filter event.status=="ACTIVE" and dt.davis.is_duplicate==false
| fieldsAdd severity=if(
  event.category=="AVAILABILITY", 1, else: if(
  event.category=="ERROR", 2, else: if(
  event.category=="SLOWDOWN", 3, else: if(
  event.category=="RESOURCE_CONTENTION", 4, else: if(
  event.category=="CUSTOM_ALERT", 2)))))
| sort severity, display_id
| expand affected_entity_ids
| filter (in(k8s.cluster.name, $Cluster) and in(k8s.namespace.name, $Namespace)) or affected_entity_ids in [
fetch dt.entity.process_group_instance
| filter belongs_to[dt.entity.container_group_instance] in [
  fetch dt.entity.container_group_instance
  | filter belongs_to[dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster] in [
    fetch dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster
    | filter in(entity.name, $Cluster)
    | fields id
  ]
  | filter in(namespaceName, $Namespace)
  | fields id
]
| fields id
| append [
fetch dt.entity.service
| filter belongs_to[dt.entity.cloud_application][0] in [
  fetch dt.entity.cloud_application
  | filter clustered_by[dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster] in [
    fetch dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster
    | filter in(entity.name, $Cluster)
    | fields id
  ]
  | filter in(namespaceName, $Namespace)
  | fields id
]
| fields id
]
]
| dedup display_id
| fieldsRename Start=event.start, ID=display_id, Severity=event.category, Name = event.name, Cluster=k8s.cluster.name, Namespace=k8s.namespace.name, Workload=k8s.workload.name
| summarize count(), min(severity)

25.title: üî• CPU Usage

26.title: üìÉ Memory Usage

27.title: ‚öì K8s events
27.query:
fetch events
  | filter event.provider == "KUBERNETES_EVENT" and in(dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster.name, $Cluster) and in(dt.entity.cloud_application_namespace.name, $Namespace)
  | dedup event.id, sort:{timestamp desc}
  | fieldsAdd
    event.category = if(isNull(status), event.category, else: status),
    event.description = if(isNull(event.description), dt.kubernetes.event.message, else: event.description),
    event.reason = dt.kubernetes.event.reason
  | fieldsAdd  event.description = if(isNull(event.reason), event.description, else:concat(event.reason,": ", event.description))
  | sort timestamp desc
  | fieldsRename Timestamp=timestamp, Status=event.category, Description=event.description

28.title: ‚õî Failed Traces
28.query:
fetch spans
| filter k8s.cluster.uid in [
  fetch dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster
  | filter in(entity.name, $Cluster)
  | fields kubernetesClusterId
]
and in(k8s.namespace.name, array($Namespace)) and isTrueOrNull(request.is_failed) and request.is_root_span
| fields Timestamp=start_time, Namespace=k8s.namespace.name, Workload=k8s.deployment.name, Service=entityName(dt.entity.service), Endpoint=endpoint.name, Duration=duration, start_time, end_time, trace.id, span.id
| sort end_time desc
| limit 20

32.title: üõë Problems
32.query:
fetch dt.davis.problems
| filter dt.davis.is_duplicate==false
| fieldsAdd severity=if(
  event.category=="AVAILABILITY", 1, else: if(
  event.category=="ERROR", 2, else: if(
  event.category=="SLOWDOWN", 3, else: if(
  event.category=="RESOURCE_CONTENTION", 4, else: if(
  event.category=="CUSTOM_ALERT", 2)))))
| sort severity, display_id
| expand affected_entity_ids
| filter (in(k8s.cluster.name, $Cluster) and in(k8s.namespace.name, $Namespace)) or affected_entity_ids in [
fetch dt.entity.process_group_instance
| filter belongs_to[dt.entity.container_group_instance] in [
  fetch dt.entity.container_group_instance
  | filter belongs_to[dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster] in [
    fetch dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster
    | filter in(entity.name, $Cluster)
    | fields id
  ]
  | filter in(namespaceName, $Namespace)
  | fields id
]
| sort entity.name
| fields id
| append [
fetch dt.entity.service
| filter belongs_to[dt.entity.cloud_application][0] in [
  fetch dt.entity.cloud_application
  | filter clustered_by[dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster] in [
    fetch dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster
    | filter in(entity.name, $Cluster)
    | fields id
  ]
  | filter in(namespaceName, $Namespace)
  | fields id
]
| sort entity.name
| fields id
]
]
| dedup display_id
| fieldsRename Status=event.status, Start=event.start, ID=display_id, Severity=event.category, Name = event.name, Cluster=k8s.cluster.name, Namespace=k8s.namespace.name, Workload=k8s.workload.name, `Affected Users`=dt.davis.affected_users_count, `Root Cause`=root_cause_entity_name
| sort Status, Severity, Start

33.title: üíæ PVC Volume Usage
33.query:
timeseries pvc_used = sum(dt.kubernetes.persistentvolumeclaim.used, rollup:avg), by:{k8s.persistent_volume_claim.name}, filter: in(k8s.cluster.name, $Cluster) and in(k8s.namespace.name, $Namespace), from: -1h | lookup [timeseries capacity = sum(dt.kubernetes.persistentvolumeclaim.capacity, rollup:avg), by:{k8s.persistent_volume_claim.name}, filter: in(k8s.cluster.name, $Cluster) and in(k8s.namespace.name, $Namespace) ], sourceField:k8s.persistent_volume_claim.name, lookupField:k8s.persistent_volume_claim.name, fields:{capacity}
| fieldsAdd result = (pvc_used[] / capacity[]) * 100
| fieldsRemove pvc_used, capacity 
| sort result desc 
| limit 10

dt.statistics.ui.ForecastAnalyzer.query:
timeseries pvc_used = sum(dt.kubernetes.persistentvolumeclaim.used, rollup:avg), by:{k8s.persistent_volume_claim.name}, filter: in(k8s.cluster.name, "dev-rh-eks") and in(k8s.namespace.name, ], sourceField:k8s.persistent_volume_claim.name, lookupField:k8s.persistent_volume_claim.name, fields:{capacity}
| fieldsAdd result = (pvc_used[] / capacity[]) * 100
| fieldsRemove pvc_used, capacity 
| sort result desc 
| limit 10

34.title: üß© Components
34.query:
fetch dt.entity.service
| filter belongs_to[dt.entity.cloud_application][0] in [
  fetch dt.entity.cloud_application
  | filter clustered_by[dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster] in [
    fetch dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster
    | filter in(entity.name, $Cluster)
    | fields id
  ]
  | filter in(namespaceName, $Namespace)
  | fields id
]
| sort entity.name
| fields Type="Service", Name=entity.name, id
| append [
fetch dt.entity.process_group_instance
| filter belongs_to[dt.entity.container_group_instance] in [
  fetch dt.entity.container_group_instance
  | filter belongs_to[dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster] in [
    fetch dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster
    | filter in(entity.name, $Cluster)
    | fields id
  ]
  | filter in(namespaceName, $Namespace)
  | fields id
]
| sort entity.name
| fields Type="Process", Name=entity.name, id
]
| append [
fetch dt.entity.cloud_application
| filter clustered_by[dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster] in [
  fetch dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster
  | filter in(entity.name, $Cluster)
  | fields id
]
| filter in(namespaceName, $Namespace)
| sort entity.name
| fields Type="Workload", Name=entity.name, id
]
| append [
fetch dt.entity.kubernetes_service
| filter clustered_by[dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster] in [
  fetch dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster
  | filter in(entity.name, $Cluster)
  | fields id
]
| filter in(namespaceName, $Namespace)
| sort entity.name
| fields Type="K8s Service", Name=entity.name, id
]
| append [
  fetch dt.entity.cloud_application_instance
  | filter clustered_by[dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster] in [
    fetch dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster
    | filter in(entity.name, $Cluster)
    | fields id
  ]
  | filter in(namespaceName, $Namespace)
  | fields Type="Pod", Name=entity.name, id
]

35.query:
fetch dt.entity.service
| filter belongs_to[dt.entity.cloud_application][0] in [
  fetch dt.entity.cloud_application
  | filter clustered_by[dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster] in [
    fetch dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster
    | filter in(entity.name, $Cluster)
    | fields id
  ]
  | filter in(namespaceName, $Namespace)
  | fields id
]
| sort entity.name
| fields Type="Service", Name=entity.name, id
| append [
fetch dt.entity.process_group_instance
| filter belongs_to[dt.entity.container_group_instance] in [
  fetch dt.entity.container_group_instance
  | filter belongs_to[dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster] in [
    fetch dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster
    | filter in(entity.name, $Cluster)
    | fields id
  ]
  | filter in(namespaceName, $Namespace)
  | fields id
]
| sort entity.name
| fields Type="Process", Name=entity.name, id
]
| append [
fetch dt.entity.cloud_application
| filter clustered_by[dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster] in [
  fetch dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster
  | filter in(entity.name, $Cluster)
  | fields id
]
| filter in(namespaceName, $Namespace)
| sort entity.name
| fields Type="Workload", Name=entity.name, id
]
| append [
fetch dt.entity.kubernetes_service
| filter clustered_by[dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster] in [
  fetch dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster
  | filter in(entity.name, $Cluster)
  | fields id
]
| filter in(namespaceName, $Namespace)
| sort entity.name
| fields Type="K8s Service", Name=entity.name, id
]
| append [
  fetch dt.entity.cloud_application_instance
  | filter clustered_by[dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster] in [
    fetch dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster
    | filter in(entity.name, $Cluster)
    | fields id
  ]
  | filter in(namespaceName, $Namespace)
  | fields Type="Pod", Name=entity.name, id
]

37.title: Frontend Health
37.query:
fetch dt.entity.application
| expand service=calls[dt.entity.service]
| filter service in [
  fetch dt.entity.service
  | filter belongs_to[dt.entity.cloud_application][0] in [
    fetch dt.entity.cloud_application
    | filter clustered_by[dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster] in [
      fetch dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster
      | filter in(entity.name, $Cluster)
      | fields id
    ]
    | filter in(namespaceName, $Namespace)
    | fields id
  ]
  | fields id
]  
| dedup id
| lookup [
  fetch dt.davis.problems
  | filter event.status=="ACTIVE" and dt.davis.is_duplicate==false
  | expand affected_entity_ids
], sourceField:id, lookupField:affected_entity_ids, fields:{event.status, display_id, event.start, event.id}
| fieldsAdd status=if(event.status=="ACTIVE", "Problem", else: "OK"), timestamp=$dt_timeframe_to
| sort event.status asc, entity.name

38.title: Pod Health
38.query:
fetch dt.entity.cloud_application_instance
| filter clustered_by[dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster] in [
  fetch dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster
  | filter in(entity.name, $Cluster)
  | fields id
]
| filter in(namespaceName, $Namespace)
| lookup [
  fetch dt.davis.problems
  | filter event.status=="ACTIVE" and dt.davis.is_duplicate==false
  | expand affected_entity_ids
], sourceField:id, lookupField:affected_entity_ids, fields:{event.status, display_id, event.start, event.id}
| fieldsAdd status=if(event.status=="ACTIVE", "Problem", else: "OK")
| sort event.status asc, entity.name

40.title: Node Health
40.query:
fetch dt.entity.kubernetes_node
| filter clustered_by[dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster] in [
    fetch dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster
    | filter in(entity.name, $Cluster)
    | fields id
  ]
| lookup [
  fetch dt.davis.problems
  | filter event.status=="ACTIVE" and dt.davis.is_duplicate==false
  | expand affected_entity_ids
], sourceField:id, lookupField:affected_entity_ids, fields:{event.status, display_id, event.start, event.id}
| fieldsAdd status=if(event.status=="ACTIVE", "Problem", else: "OK")
| sort event.status asc, entity.name

41.title: Cluster Health
41.query:
fetch dt.entity.kubernetes_cluster
| filter in(entity.name, $Cluster)
| lookup [
  fetch dt.davis.problems
  | filter event.status=="ACTIVE" and dt.davis.is_duplicate==false
  | expand affected_entity_ids
], sourceField:id, lookupField:affected_entity_ids, fields:{event.status, display_id, event.start, event.id}
| fieldsAdd status=if(event.status=="ACTIVE", "Problem", else: "OK")
| sort event.status asc, entity.name
